long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Promptsion - AI Search Assistant & Prompt Engineer

Promptsion is an extension that lets you perform quick AI searches while browsing the web. Simply highlight text to get instant, context-aware AI responses and explanations.

Key Features:
• Instant AI Search - Highlight any text for immediate AI assistance and explanations
• Smart Context Understanding - AI analyzes the full webpage context for more accurate responses
• Prompt Engineering - Transform basic prompts into optimized AI prompts that are clear and concise.
• Search History - Track and revisit your past prompts and responses
• Works Everywhere - Compatible with articles, research papers, documentation, and any webpage


Promptsion is perfect for students, researchers, professionals, and anyone who wants to understand content faster with AI assistance than traditional AI websites and applications. Get AI assistance right in your browser faster with less clicks.

Get started free - upgrade anytime if you want more power, with access to the extension.
